title: THE SERVER IS UP
body:
BUT DJ SONA ISN'T BUYABLE
RITO WHY http://puu.sh/gcr9a/3ea76c77fb.jpg

replies.body:
Hey Guys,
I have fixed the DJ Sona skin release.
I am looking into how this happened but in short the store settings were setup correctly and got modified overnight, hence the skin not showing up in the store.

I apologize for the delay.

-ToxicHawk

> [{quoted}](name=ToxicHawk,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0dIbgsP2,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-02-25T21:09:40.265+0000)
>
> Hey Guys,
> I have fixed the DJ Sona skin release.
> I am looking into how this happened but in short the store settings were setup correctly and got modified overnight, hence the skin not showing up in the store.
> 
> I apologize for the delay.
> 
> -ToxicHawk

I don't even play sona but this makes me happy
yep been waiting since 5:30am for servers to come back online to find out we can't purchase it still. I know for a fact american players have it already.
Thank the divines we got a response ;w; Thank you Hawk you big beast you \o/

http://puu.sh/gcv7V/45742bddc0.jpg

WHY WOULD THEY TEASE LIKE THIS, IT'S STILL UN-BUYABLE
Rabble rabble rabble.... I WANT MY SONA SKIN :( its the only highlight to my day
honestly I'm so sad it's not up yet
I sense every Ranked/Normals game will be full with Sonas with this Skin for the next few days...

> [{quoted}](name=MoodswingModz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0dIbgsP2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-25T20:21:11.763+0000)
>
> I sense every Ranked/Normals game will be full with Sonas with this Skin for the next few days...

i dunno i'd say vast majority of the community would be at least under 18 and unless they are in the their parents pocket not a lot of people can just chuck down $20 on a skin, i remember when the other 2 came there wasn't a lot of prevalence, i just look forward to destroying sona mid TBH
